subject: Upgrade OpenGL ES to version 3.1 - add missing function implementations for EGL 1.5 - upgrade GL ES header files to latest dates - removed 'get proc addr' related functions and data (previously used for simulator testing)
commitMessage:
Upgrade OpenGL ES to version 3.1
- add missing function implementations for EGL 1.5
- upgrade GL ES header files to latest dates
- removed 'get proc addr' related functions and data (previously used for simulator testing)
